info.name: Long-Polling
info.author: Luke Owncloud
info.description: Long-Polling for changes in ownCloud. Activate, then browse to https://[yourOcServer]/index.php/apps/long_polling/poll for further details. For Linux only as it requires System V IPC, refer to http://www.tldp.org/LDP/lpg/node21.html and http://php.net/manual/en/sem.installation.php
